snippet.title: Luigi's Mansion 2D: Eternal Night - Area 3 + Local Coop RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Download links: https://thehappyfaceking.itch.io/luigis-mansion-2d
https://gamejolt.com/games/luigis-mansion-2d/504777

Get your ghost hunting equipment it's time to get into some ghost-busting action with a friend with the new local co-op featuring Gooigi, and a new demo for Area 3!

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9M2SF3w3SB8
